content: The Crouching Tiger Temple is one of two possible second main regions of Chapter 2 in the Yellow Wind Ridge of Black Myth: Wukong. Below you'll find a guide for the Temple and its main boss fight against the Tiger Vanguard, as well as the secret Cellar beneath it once you have the Keeness of Tiger.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Crouching_Tiger_Temple_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Crouching Tiger Temple Walkthrough'.
The content is as follows:
The Crouching Tiger Temple is one of two possible second main regions of Chapter 2 in the Yellow Wind Ridge of Black Myth: Wukong. Below you'll find a guide for the Temple and its main boss fight against the Tiger Vanguard, as well as the secret Cellar beneath it once you have the Keeness of Tiger.
